skillTree.localised_description: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.

skillTree.localised_description: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.

effects.description: Mount: Manticore

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: "And I'll lead you all in the dance," said he - the relentless dance of the tireless Undead hordes.

skillTree.localised_name: The Doom Lord of the Undead
skillTree.localised_description: Dieter Helsnicht has an iron will and can bend even the most powerful creatures to his authority.

effects.description: Ability: "Doom Lord of the Undead"

skillTree.localised_description: Dieter is a man of deep, if twisted, intelligence and has prepared for every eventuality. He has built a secret fortress deep in the Forest of Shadows to which he could escape should should the need arise.

effects.description:
Armies replenish in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +20%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Sight of Dieter riding atop the back of a monstrous manticore is not uncommon. Who knows what other monsters he has managed to bound to his will..

effects.description: Increased chance monsters will be added to the Monster Pens while raiding, fighting battles, or occupying settlements

Weapon strength: +15% for all units recruited from the Monster Pen
	(all armies factionwide)

Melee attack: +6 for all units recruited from the Monster Pen
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: From his dark and evil hiding place Helsnicht has prepared his evil plans to bring death to the Empire for decades. Those who had previously known Dieter Helsnicht in the Empire have either died or forgotten him.

effects.description: Income from post-battle loot: +30% when fighting against Men

Melee attack: +6 when fighting against Men
	(Lord's army)

Vampiric corruption: +3
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Dieter, drawn by an irresistible curiosity, travelled to the fortress of Nagashizzar as a young man. What happened to him in that cursed place is not known, but he returned to Middenheim a changed man, his hair turned prematurely grey and his skin tinged with an unhealthy pallor. The Doomlord had been born!

effects.description: Attribute: Mastery of the Elemental Winds

Attribute: Mastery of the Elemental Winds for Necromancer Heroes
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

skillTree.localised_description: From his secret fortress hidden deep in the Forest of Shadows the Doom Lord remains a threat to the Empire's security. Shambling corpses and terrifying Wraiths are often seen wondering their abyssal forests, and tales persist that the Doom will approach them eventually.

factionEffects.localised_description: Dieter Helsnicht, known as the Doom Lord of Middenheim or Doom Lord of the Undead. He built a secret fortress in the Forest of Shadows and concealed it so well that it was never discovered by the Witch Hunters who searched for him for years. There he slowly built up his strength and plotted his revenge.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Dieter Helsnicht, known as the Doom Lord of Middenheim or Doom Lord of the Undead. He built a secret fortress in the Forest of Shadows and concealed it so well that it was never discovered by the Witch Hunters who searched for him for years. There he slowly built up his strength and plotted his revenge.
